label: Digital Public Goods Alliance (DPGA)
description: A multi-stakeholder initiative accelerating the attainment of the Sustainable Development Goals by facilitating the discovery, development, use of, and investment in digital public goods.

label: Digital Impact Exchange (DIAL Exchange)
description: The Digital Impact Exchange is a comprehensive platform for discovering, comparing, and connecting with digital solutions and tools for the development sector, managed by the Digital Impact Alliance.

label: ClimaHealth
description: ClimaHealth is a global open-access platform developed by the World Health Organization (WHO) and World Meteorological Organization (WMO) to facilitate access to actionable knowledge protecting populations from the health risks of climate change and environmental hazards.

label: Open Data Institute
description: Global open data registry and platform for sharing open data initiatives and tools.
